metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7942 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The XGetImage function in X.org libX11 before 1.6.4 might allow remote X servers to gain privileges via vectors involving image type and geometry, which triggers out-of-bounds read operations.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7942` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libx11-6 - 2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.1
libx11-data - 2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.1
libx11-xcb1 - 2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libx11 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.1').
